attributes.action: Give parents of children that have free school meals extra money
attributes.additional_details: I want the government to listen to the other countries and stop putting our children at risk you want the children to go back to school on school days and get their free hot school meal this is further putting our children at risk you have closed schools so why would we send our children back to school to get a meal and how can we if we are self isolating because of your guidance that still leaves our children without a school meal and the school states if you want to it's a joke so thanks boris
attributes.background: I want the government to give parents of children that have free school meals extra money instead of sending the children back to school for a meal to be at risk especially children that have health conditions etc please Boris don't keep putting our children at risk to bring back to their family.

rejection.details:
The Government has said that, to support children eligible for free school meals, schools will be able to provide meals or vouchers for supermarkets or local shops: https://www.gov.uk/government/news/voucher-scheme-launches-for-schools-providing-free-school-meals

You can find out more about coronavirus and how you can protect yourself and others here:

www.gov.uk/coronavirus 

https://www.nhs.uk/conditions/coronavirus-covid-19/ 

The Government has also created an online service to help you out what you can do if you’re struggling because of coronavirus: https://www.gov.uk/find-coronavirus-support 

You can read NHS tips to help if you are worried about coronavirus here: https://www.nhs.uk/oneyou/every-mind-matters/coronavirus-covid-19-anxiety-tips
